text: kalin manawa himikam sasiwarayedi itu karana bawa ki deda karannata lankawe aanduwa asamath wi athi bawa aanduwama dani.

kasiye wasiya dina ganimin palamuwen panduwata pahara dimata pitiyata piwisi shri lanka drushyabadhitha krikat kridakayo kadulu 7k pamanak dawi lakunu 205k laba gaththe ardha shathaka kihipayak thama inimata ek kara ganimini.
ohu kiweya.atham wita aadaraya akalaye apawa wiyapath karayi.

mithraya, pansil rakinna swargayata yayi.

as katha karanawa (3)

'ramayanaya' wishala balapamak kara athi athara, rama, sitha, hanuman dewathwayata pathkara thibena 'ramayanaya', 1886 mayi masa 31 wanida pitakotuwe pushpa shalawedi lankeya sangithagnyayan wu udumala marikkar saha abdul lathifge sangithayen mulwarata wedikagatha wuwada, shalawa gini thabimen natyaya mulumaninma penwimata nohaki wu athara, nithignya jon da silwada kalakirimata pathwiya.
